summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 25, Capitol Hill Addition, Division NO. 4, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with concrete and making all provisions necessary for the surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5168, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
